Reviews.Title: Loveeeeee my cellphone!
Reviews.Author: hector prieto
Reviews.Content: GREAT!!  PERFECT!!, it was what was waiting. I asked for it to use it for Venezuela and it works perfectly. Only it comes in English and Frenchman but with an APP it is possible to use in Spanish. I am charmed with it!

Reviews.Title: all good
Reviews.Author: luis morales
Reviews.Content: all good product came in perfect condition and at the right time and the excellent quality and a fair price

Reviews.Title: Excellent backup cell
Reviews.Author: Luis "Luis"
Reviews.Content: First : is the best phone you can buy for this price. Is fast , clear, has radio and the camera is good. The down side is: battery is weak, under sunlight is very difficult take pictures because you can see barely anything . The android version no the best.. But again..for the price is the best you can get.

Reviews.Title: really good phone
Reviews.Author: Jerrell Slaughter
Reviews.Content: This is a really good phone. My first smart phone and I am pleased. Not crazy about the home page people and some of the other preset features, but overall I am satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: YennyPena
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, the reason I gave it four stars is that it comes in Spanish, English and French only :(

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Rosa
Reviews.Content: Is a good telephone.Is complete whit old the accesoriesis a versatile phone as we expectedthanks for the reliable delivery

Reviews.Title: For the price, don't miss it.
Reviews.Author: RBT123
Reviews.Content: Good phone, with a good shape similar to all modern smartphones.Some difficults with the Good play as it said Invalid files for most of downloaded applications.

Reviews.Title: is a very useful product
Reviews.Author: Simon Conde
Reviews.Content: this is a very good phone. has specs very balanced, making it a very attractive option for release in the field of mobile inteligentes.es friendly and works for all audiences from students to executives

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: MariaG
Reviews.Content: Well, is not the best cell phone of world, but is perfect for this price. It is lightweight and easy to use. Just as expected.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD after all... Wouldn't recommend it..
Reviews.Author: Gamel
Reviews.Content: I bought this item expecting model which comes with front & back camera plus flash however received one without those characteristics. I complaint about this and they refund me 10 bucks because of the wrong item, by the moment everything was good notwithstanding just after few weeks realized phone lost signal when locked with a code or unlock patron, as well phone is not charging correctly and aparently I'll have to pay technician to fix it once I cannot return back to Asia!I don't recommend this stuff to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Carrier Branded
Reviews.Author: B. Stark "Stark Rhavyn"
Reviews.Content: The phone was a gift for my wife and works just fine even though it's has some carrier branding by something called "TIM". I guess it's Venezuelan based on some the above questions. It shipped from NYC though. I use NET 10 on this one.Included in the branding are some TIM apps that you can't delete, which is unfortunate.Better than the Chinese branded one that I returned before buying this one, though. Apparently in China the phone itself (the Y300-0100) is slightly different: only one camera, two SIMs slots, and no flash.The one from this seller DID include all these features.I bought another one of these phones for myself from Best Buy and I would suggest going that route. It's actually unlocked, includes all features and no carrier branding. It'll cost you a little more though.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: YENNY V.
Reviews.Content: I purchased the phone came just in time, it works perfectly and I am very satisfied with the purchase. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Does Everything I Expected and more
Reviews.Author: L. Petti
Reviews.Content: I Love it... everything works perfectly. Lots of features. Very user friendly. Arrived on time. i am very pleased. great buy

Reviews.Title: A pain to have this phone.  It is an Australian phone.
Reviews.Author: Daphne
Reviews.Content: It is an Australian phone and seller does not say it on the website.  Although it is unlocked, my sim card does not pick up any signal.  On the phone it has Telstra as network server (Australian).  After several service calls to T Mobile, they told me I am roaming!!!! It has been days after I received this phone; I still cannot use it.  No services! What a pain.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price, But it could be better.
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone for the price of $106, BUT it could be better. It takes about 20 seconds to switch from front camera to back camera. It's so annoying, also it could be better if the had the default apps like other phones. I have a plan of 2.5 GB and guess what? The first two weeks I been using it has been working good but now, it sucks. So take into consideration that it will waste your gigabytes in less than two weeks.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Ian Van Rensselaer
Reviews.Content: Well Its a good phone and came quickly, but I was charged more than was advertised.I can't find an easy place to go to get this checked out either! If I had know how much it was really going to be I would have gotten something else. This being more than anticipated, ruined the rest of my christmas shopping, throwing my spending limit off!

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900, 3G Network: HSPA 850 / 1900 / 2100, This phone is the single sim card model (only takes 1 sim card at a time), Model: Y300-0151
Dual Core 1GHZ CPU, Beautiful 4" scratch-resistant display lets you enjoy vibrant images and video, Runs on Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) operating system
Features a dual-facing 5MP AF Camera that supports video chatting, digital zoom, and includes an LED flash on rear camera.
4GB built in memory (about 2GB free), microSD slot for expandable memory (card not included)
BULK ITEM, NO RETAIL BOX, MAY BE CARRIER BRANDED BUT IS COMPLETELY UNLOCKED, INCLUDES: Phone, Travel Charger, USB Cable, Rechargeable Battery, Earpiece,
ProductInfo.Name: UNLOCKED Huawei Ascend Y300 Google Android Phone, Y300-0151 Front and Rear Camera, 5MP, BLACK, NEW, BULK PACKAGED, 2G GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ, 3G HSPA 850/1900/2100MHZ
